name: We Are SUP
description:
A simple bra-fighting game that only uses addition! Dive into dungeons and defeat monsters in online play!

Strengthen your weapons to defeat monsters in dungeons!

Game Description

"We Are SUP" is a bluff-style board game where supporters defeat monsters in dungeons.
The only way for weak supporters to survive is to defeat monsters in one blow!
Players play buff cards from their dealt hands one by one on the field to accumulate attack power.


Cards can be placed face down on the field when the conditions are met. It's an advantageous situation where only the player knows the value of the cards!


When the total accumulated attack power from everyone surpasses the monster's health, the attack begins!


Declare the highest attack power within the total of the cards played!
Be careful because it explodes if you go over.


Get rewards and dance for joy!

Multiplayer

Supports online multiplayer for up to 6 players!
If you go to the adventurer's guild, unknown players waiting for you and your friends are recruiting parties. Of course, you can also become the leader of the party!
Whether you aim for maximum happiness by joining hands or defeat all the enemies and monopolize the rewards, it's up to you! Cooperation or interference, it's your choice!

Features

- Simple gameplay that only uses addition
- Turn-based buff phase and real-time auction attack phase
- Supports online multiplayer for up to 6 players
- Card deck that changes depending on the number of players
- Many effects that couldn't be implemented in analog games

For Streamer

Honami Software allows the use of games produced by Honami Software for streaming (videos/live streaming) and monetization.
